gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Clippers 112, Bulls 102
gameRecap.excerpt: Los Angeles defeats Chicago, 112-102. For Los Angeles, Paul George led the way with 22 points, five rebounds, nine assists, two steals, and three blocks while aided by Kawhi Leonard (19 points, nine rebounds, four assists) and James Harden recording his 76th career triple double (14 points, season-high 11 rebounds, 10 assists) in the victory. DeMar DeRozan finished with a double-double (24 points, eight rebounds, 10 assists) and Nikola Vucevic tallied 22 points and 11 rebounds for Chicago in the losing effort. Los Angeles improves to 41-21 on the season, while Chicago moves to 31-33 with the loss.
